name: ExcuseMe
0:
”Alexa, ask Excuse Me for an excuse.”
”Alexa, open Excuse Me.”
”Alexa, ask Excuse Me to give me an excuse.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: excuse me
des:
Are you running out of excuses to get out of work? Hang with friends? Or even to avoid family? Just ask Alexa for an excuse, and she'll be glad to help!

Excuse categories coming soon!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
